description.zh-cn: 一个共产党和共产主义组织的国际联合组织，1919年3月在弗拉基米尔·列宁领导下成立，总部设于苏联莫斯科，1943年6月10日宣告解散。
description.en: An international federation of communist parties and organizations, founded in March 1919 under the leadership of Vladimir Lenin, headquartered in Moscow, Soviet Union, and announced its dissolution on June 10, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 俄国共产主义革命家、政治家和政治理论家，共产国际的创始人。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, founder of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 俄国马克思主义革命家、政治理论家，共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Russian Marxist revolutionary and theorist, one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克革命家，共产国际的创始人之一，曾任共产国际执行委员会第一任主席。
description.en: Bolshevik revolutionary, one of the founders of the Communist International, and the first Chairman of its Executive Committee.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义活动家，共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Marxist activist, one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克革命家，共产国际的创始人之一，曾任共产国际执行委员会主席。
description.en: Bolshevik revolutionary, one of the founders of the Communist International, and a former Chairman of its Executive Committee.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，长期担任苏联最高领导人，对共产国际有重大影响力。
description.en: Soviet politician who served as the supreme leader of the Soviet Union for a long period and held significant influence over the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 保加利亚共产主义政治家，1934年后担任共产国际执行委员会主席。
description.en: Bulgarian communist politician who served as Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International after 1934.

description.zh-cn: 德国马克思主义理论家、活动家和女权主义者。
description.en: German Marxist theorist, activist, and feminist.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆北部的社会主义国家，共产国际总部所在地。
description.en: A socialist state in Northern Eurasia where the headquarters of the Communist International was located.

en: Executive Committee of the Communist International

description.zh-cn: 共产国际的最高执行机构，在1943年5月作出解散共产国际的决定。
description.en: The highest executive body of the Communist International, which made the decision to dissolve the organization in May 1943.

nodes.id: 苏联共产党中央委员会国际部

zh-cn: 苏联共产党中央委员会国际部
en: International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 共产国际解散后，其相关人员和组织转入该机构。
description.en: After the dissolution of the Comintern, its personnel and organizations were transferred to this department.

description.zh-cn: 社会主义和劳工政党的国际组织，共产国际的前身之一。
description.en: An international organization of socialist and labour parties, one of the predecessors of the Communist International.

nodes.id: 共产党和工人党情报局

zh-cn: 共产党和工人党情报局

description.zh-cn: 共产国际的后继组织。
description.en: The successor organization to the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 即第二次世界大战，共产国际的解散被声称是为了适应其发展。
description.en: Also known as World War II, the dissolution of the Comintern was claimed to be an adaptation to its development.

description.zh-cn: 俄国布尔什维克党领导的武装起义，建立了苏维埃政权，为共产国际的成立创造了条件。
description.en: An armed insurrection led by the Bolshevik Party in Russia, which established Soviet power and created the conditions for the founding of the Comintern.

description.zh-cn: 二战期间苏联的盟国之一。
description.en: One of the Soviet Union's allies during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 二战期间苏联的盟国之一。
description.en: One of the Soviet Union's allies during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际及其盟国在二战期间的主要敌人。
description.en: The primary enemy of the Comintern and its allies during World War II.

nodes.id: 共产国际第二次代表大会

zh-cn: 共产国际第二次代表大会
en: 2nd World Congress of the Communist International

description.zh-cn: 共产国际的第二次代表大会，通过了《共产国际章程》和“二十一条”。
description.en: The second congress of the Comintern, which adopted the Statutes of the Communist International and the "Twenty-one Conditions".

description.zh-cn: 共产国际第二次代表大会通过的加入共产国际的条件。
description.en: The conditions for admission to the Communist International adopted by its Second World Congress.

nodes.id: 共产国际第三次代表大会

zh-cn: 共产国际第三次代表大会
en: 3rd World Congress of the Communist International

description.zh-cn: 共产国际的第三次代表大会，中国共产党首次派代表参加。
description.en: The third congress of the Comintern, attended by delegates from the Chinese Communist Party for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，出席了共产国际第三次代表大会。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party who attended the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员，出席了共产国际第三次代表大会。
description.en: An early member of the Chinese Communist Party who attended the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际第七次代表大会决定的反法西斯统一战线策略。
description.en: An anti-fascist united front strategy decided upon at the 7th World Congress of the Comintern.

nodes.id: 共产国际第七次代表大会

zh-cn: 共产国际第七次代表大会
en: 7th World Congress of the Communist International

description.zh-cn: 共产国际最后一次代表大会，决定建立反法西斯人民阵线。
description.en: The last congress of the Comintern, which decided to establish the anti-fascist popular front.

description.zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·列宁领导成立了共产国际。
description.en: Vladimir Lenin led the founding of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 格里戈里·季诺维也夫是共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Grigory Zinoviev was one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·拉狄克是共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Karl Radek was one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 尼古拉·布哈林是共产国际的创始人之一。
description.en: Nikolai Bukharin was one of the founders of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 俄国十月革命的成功，为第三国际的成立提供了政治基础和号召力。
description.en: The success of the October Revolution in Russia provided the political basis and appeal for the establishment of the Third International.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际由第二国际中的革命派分裂出来而成立，以区别于后者的改良主义路线。
description.en: The Communist International was formed by a split of the revolutionary wing from the Second International, distinguishing itself from the latter's reformist line.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际执行委员会主席团于1943年5月15日作出提议解散共产国际的决定，并于6月10日正式宣告解散。
description.en: The Presidium of the Executive Committee of the Communist International made the decision to propose the dissolution of the Comintern on May 15, 1943, and officially announced its dissolution on June 10.

relationships.target: 苏联共产党中央委员会国际部

description.zh-cn: 共产国际解散后，其相关人员和组织转入新成立的苏联共产党中央委员会国际部。
description.en: After the dissolution of the Comintern, its personnel and organizations were transferred to the newly established International Department of the Central Committee of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 为在反法西斯战争中拉拢英美等国，苏联主导解散了以反对资本主义国家为目的的共产国际。
description.en: In order to win over countries like the United Kingdom and the United States in the anti-fascist war, the Soviet Union led the dissolution of the Comintern, which was originally established to oppose capitalist countries.

description.zh-cn: 作为苏联的最高领导人，约瑟夫·斯大林对共产国际的活动及决议拥有重大影响力。
description.en: As the supreme leader of the Soviet Union, Joseph Stalin held significant influence over the activities and resolutions of the Communist International.

relationships.target: 共产党和工人党情报局

description.zh-cn: 共产党和工人党情报局是共产国际的后继组织。
description.en: The Cominform was the successor organization to the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 格里戈里·季诺维也夫是共产国际执行委员会的第一任主席。
description.en: Grigory Zinoviev was the first Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 尼古拉·布哈林于1926年至1929年间担任共产国际执行委员会主席。
description.en: Nikolai Bukharin served as Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International from 1926 to 1929.

description.zh-cn: 格奥尔基·季米特洛夫于1935年至1943年解散前担任共产国际执行委员会主席。
description.en: Georgi Dimitrov served as Chairman of the Executive Committee of the Communist International from 1935 until its dissolution in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 克拉拉·蔡特金在1929年私下批评共产国际已从一个活的政治体变成一个只会复述苏联指令的僵死机构，但公开场合仍表示支持。
description.en: In 1929, Klara Zetkin privately criticized the Comintern as having transformed from a living political body into a dead machine that only repeated Soviet directives, although she continued to support it publicly.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际将纳粹德国等法西斯政权视为主要敌人，并号召建立反法西斯统一战线。
description.en: The Comintern regarded fascist regimes like Nazi Germany as its primary enemy and called for the establishment of an anti-fascist united front.

description.zh-cn: 解散共产国际是苏联为在第二次世界大战中拉拢美国作为盟友而采取的妥协举动。
description.en: The dissolution of the Comintern was a compromise made by the Soviet Union to win over the United States as an ally in World War II.

description.zh-cn: 解散共产国际是苏联为在第二次世界大战中拉拢英国作为盟友而采取的妥协举动。
description.en: The dissolution of the Comintern was a compromise made by the Soviet Union to win over the United Kingdom as an ally in World War II.

relationships.source: 共产国际第二次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 共产国际第二次代表大会通过了加入共产国际的条件《二十一条》。
description.en: The Second World Congress of the Communist International adopted the "Twenty-one Conditions" for admission to the Comintern.

relationships.target: 共产国际第三次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 张太雷作为中共代表之一，出席了共产国际第三次代表大会。
description.en: Zhang Tailei attended the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern as one of the delegates of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 共产国际第三次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 杨明斋作为中共代表之一，出席了共产国际第三次代表大会。
description.en: Yang Mingzhai attended the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern as one of the delegates of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.source: 共产国际第七次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 共产国际第七次代表大会决定采取人民阵线策略，联合各国力量建立广泛的反法西斯统一战线。
description.en: The 7th World Congress of the Comintern decided to adopt the Popular Front strategy, uniting forces in various countries to build a broad anti-fascist united front.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际执行委员会是共产国际的执行机构。
description.en: The Executive Committee of the Communist International was the executive body of the Comintern.
